ing: 1 small head red cabbage, finely shredded
des: "A sweet and sour side dish that's really nice with pork, ham, or sausage. Tastes better on day two, and freezes well."
ins: Place water in a large saucepan, and stir in cabbage, apples, brown sugar, vinegar, cinnamon, allspice, cloves, and 1 tablespoon butter. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and cover. Simmer 45 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender. Stir in remaining butter before serving.
